project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that streamlines the onboarding process, improves customer time-to-value, and enhances customer success manager (CSM) efficiency.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Successful login with main SaaS credentials

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate display of onboarding steps per subscription tier

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to enable seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Successful retrieval and display of knowledge base articles

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics, such as daily active users and feature usage.
technical_requirements: Data integration with main SaaS product
acceptance_criteria: Accurate display of key adoption metrics

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Seamless ticket/email creation with customer data

technical_architecture.data_flow: Customer data is retrieved from the CRM, processed by the microservices, and presented in the web application. Usage data is collected, processed, and displayed in the adoption metrics dashboard.
security_considerations: Use TLS 1.2+ for all network communications
Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for user permissions
Conduct regular security audits and penetration testing

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, focusing on the critical features.
deliverables: Integrated with SSO, knowledge base, and CRM

implementation_phases.description: Expand the COSP functionality with additional features to improve customer success and CSM efficiency.
deliverables: Enhanced COSP with adoption metrics and CSM integration

risk_analysis.description: Potential delays in third-party API integrations (SSO, knowledge base, CRM)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with integration providers early, establish clear communication and escalation channels, plan for contingencies

risk_analysis.description: Challenges in meeting performance and scalability requirements (NFR-01, NFR-03)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct load testing, optimize database queries, implement caching strategies, and plan for infrastructure scalability

risk_analysis.description: Lack of user adoption due to poor user experience
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct user research, iterative design, and usability testing, gather continuous feedback, and make necessary UX improvements

infrastructure_needs: AWS (or equivalent cloud provider) for hosting the application and supporting services
Monitoring and logging tools for observability

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Periodic analysis of customer churn data

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Tracking of customer feature adoption timelines

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analysis of support ticket data and portal usage
